name: Electric Stun Gun Scare Joke
description:
Electric Stun Gun Scare Joke
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Stun Gun.
Electro - Shock Weapon Joke - a simulator of a handheld weapon. Always wanted to have around electric weapon? Do your friends do not exist, and you will! Choose the type that you like best, go with him through the city, and press the power button to power the sound and animation. For a more real effect of vibration is used and the camera is connected. Make fun of your friend or loved ones! Pugay cat or a dog or other pet. Attention! The game is created just for fun and entertainment, and does not bear any harm to health!
This game is a handheld electric weapon in your phone. Scare your friends and family your phone! He is always at hand.
Thanks for the game. Write a comment and we will improve it with the next update!
